Snaps#

Snaps are repeatable or extendable information blocks.

The Avengers

Earth's Mightiest Heroes joined forces to take on threats that were too big for any one hero to tackle...

The S.H.I.E.L.D.

The Strategic Homeland Intervention, Enforcement, and Logistics Division...

Add a container with the snap class. And add child elements with the snap-icon, snap-content or/and snap-action classes. The snap-icon and snap-action are optional.

There are snap-title and snap-subtitle classes for title and subtitle text styles.

<div class="snap">
  <div class="snap-icon">
    <div class="example-snap-icon">
      <i class="icon icon-file centered"></i>
    </div>
  </div>
  <div class="snap-content">
    <p class="snap-title">The Avengers</p>
    <p class="snap-subtitle">Earth's Mightiest Heroes joined forces to take on threats that were too big for any one hero to tackle...</p>
  </div>
  <div class="snap-action">
    <button class="btn btn-primary">Join</button>
  </div>
</div>

Compact snaps#

There is compact version of Tiles component, which is often used as contact and file info blocks.

Add the snap-centered class to the container snap. The snap-icon, snap-content and snap-action will be vertically centered.

spectre-docs.pdf
14MB · Public · 1 Jan, 2017 
<div class="snap snap-centered">
  <div class="snap-icon">
    <div class="example-snap-icon">
      <i class="icon icon-file centered"></i>
    </div>
  </div>
  <div class="snap-content">
    <div class="snap-title">spectre-docs.pdf</div>
    <small class="snap-subtitle text-gray">14MB · Public · 1 Jan, 2017</small>
  </div>
  <div class="snap-action">
    <button class="btn btn-link">
      <i class="icon icon-more-vert"></i>
    </button>
  </div>
</div>
